response: "Wow, did you know that companies are allowed to share your personal information without your consent? 😱 It's like, what even is the point of having data privacy laws if they're just gonna be ignored? 🤷‍♂️ I mean, I get it, data is valuable and all, but come on, can't we at least have some control over our own info? 🤔 #dataprivacy #personalinformation #security"
